Text.Page:
There's too much pain in this place. It's practically oozing from the walls.

Make this place a little less painful, . Attack the {@LinkCreature:8#4051#vulgar inquisitors}, {@LinkCreature:8#4041#cruel inquisitors}, and {@LinkCreature:8#4052#vicious auric imps} before they can invent new agonies.

I'll keep these implements where the gulas can't get to them.

On second thought, I better destroy them. Just to be sure.
Don't let them continue their horrible work, <PCNAME>. Stop those fiends!
